column1: Baby Barnaby's////We walked in for the first time and walked up to the desk. We were rudely told "sign in on the list". There was no hostess or podium and the table had no list. We were rather rudely told "Check in and sign in on the list". A couple customers seated pointed to a clip board on a post
column2: but in truth the server should have walked over to us and taken the list down as we clearly didn't see it or a hostess to take our names on the list.
